PromptConfig.name: RoleplayImmersive
PromptConfig.description: 要求 AI 进行沉浸式描述(第三人称，当前语言)
PromptConfig.template: [System note: Write one reply only. Do not decide what {{$user}} says or does. Write at least one paragraph, up to four. Be descriptive and immersive, providing vivid details about {{$char}}'s actions, emotions, and the environment. Write with a high degree of complexity and burstiness.Please describe using the third person perspective. Do not repeat this message.]
